Config.menu.title: Configuration Options
Config.menu.description: Use the "right" action to toggle an option.@br@Edit the configuration file directly for more options.@br@You might have to restart mpv or reinitialize the plugin for some of these changes to take effect (See previous menu).@br@This menu will not close automatically.
Config.notifyupdates.title: Notify about new updates
Config.notifyupdates.description: Whether to alert you when a new version is available.@br@
Config.showhints.title: Show hints on main menu
Config.showhints.description: Whether to show hints on the main menu. It looks quite empty without them.@br@
Config.showclock.title: Show Clock Overlay
Config.showclock.description: Whether to show an unobstrusive clock on screen.@br@
Config.clockposition.title: Clock overlay position on screen
Config.clockposition.description: Where to show the clock on screen.@br@Currently
Config.fademenu.title: Menu Fade In/Out
Config.fademenu.description: Makes some menus fade in and out (possbile performance impact).@br@Leave this disabled if unsure.@br@
Config.scrollalerts.title: Scroll Alerts
Config.scrollalerts.description: Whether to move alerts across the screen (possbile performance impact).@br@Disable if unsure.@br@
Config.showhiddenfiles.title: Show hidden Files in File Explorer
Config.showhiddenfiles.description: Hidden files can be annoying, especially on Linux.@br@Enable this to show them.@br@
Config.allowfolderdeletion.title: Allow deleting folders in File Explorer
Config.allowfolderdeletion.description: Whether to show the "Remove" option for folders.@br@IMPORTANT: You could totally delete something important by accident, so you should probably leave this disabled.@br@
Config.systemnotifications.title: Use system notifications instead of on-screen messages
Config.systemnotifications.description: On-screen messages can be quite resource inefficient, so using system notifications instead might be more desirable.@br@
Config.ipcserver.title: IPC Server
Config.ipcserver.description: Automatically launches an ipc server named "mpv".@br@If you don't know what that is, you should probably leave this disabled.@br@
Config.savefulllog.title: Save full log
Config.savefulllog.description: FOR TROUBLESHOOTING ONLY: You should not enable this unless you know what you are doing.@br@Having this enabled for extended periods of time will freeze or even crash mpv.@br@
Tests.menu.title: Tests
Tests.menu.description: This menu lets you launch tests.
Tests.menu.description.running: Test in progress!@br@(DO NOT CLOSE THIS MENU!)
Tests.runall.title: [RUN ALL TESTS ABOVE]
Tests.reset.title: [RESET ALL TESTS]
FTW.menu.title: easympv Initial Setup - Page
FTW.page1.description: Thank you for trying out easympv!@br@Since this is the first time easympv has been loaded, we will have to set a few settings.@br@You can navigate menus like this one using the mousewheel or arrow keys and enter.@br@Press "h" while any menu is shown to get more information.
FTW.page2.description: Use the left/right arrow key to change an option.
FTW.page3.description: And that is it!@br@Select "Finish" to apply your changes.
FTW.performance.first.title: Lowest / "Potato"
FTW.performance.first.description: @br@Choose this if your PC is old.@br@At this point you should probably use your phone instead.@br@
FTW.performance.second.title: Laptop / integrated GPU
FTW.performance.second.description: @br@Choose this preset if you have no dedicated GPU, or you are not sure.@br@@br@
FTW.performance.third.title: Desktop / good dedicated GPU
FTW.performance.third.description: @br@Choose this preset if your PC can play videogames well.@br@@br@
FTW.audiolanguage.description: @br@Set to "none" to use the default language specified by a video file.@br@
FTW.sublanguage.description: @br@Set to "none" to not display subtitles by default.@br@
FTW.performance.title: Performance Preset
FTW.audiolanguage.title: Default Audio Language
FTW.sublanguage.title: Default Subtitle Language
FTW.continue.title: Continue
FTW.finish.title: Finish
Input.first: Press Enter or right mouse button to submit your Input. Press ESC or left mouse button to abort.
Input.second: Press CTRL+V or middle mouse button to paste.
